opening: Hey there, brave adventurer! Are you ready for a super fun journey? Let's go...

genericMsgs.missingCmd: Oops, looks like you forgot to type a command. Please try again.
genericMsgs.invalidCmd: Hmm, I don't know that command. If you're not sure what to do, just type 'help'.
genericMsgs.helpCmd: Commands: n (north), s (south), w (west), e (east), take [item], look, inventory, help, restart, quit
genericMsgs.deadend: Oh no, there's nowhere to go here. Try looking around for a different path.
genericMsgs.emptyInventory: Your backpack is empty. Keep exploring to find things!
genericMsgs.noItemHere: There's no such item here. Keep looking!

Starting Room.name: Starting Room
Starting Room.description: You're in a big room with funny drawings on the wall.

Secret Room.name: Secret Room
Secret Room.failToEnter: It's too dark in here. You need to find a flashlight before you can go in.
Secret Room.entryMsg: With your flashlight on, you can see everything in the room.
Secret Room.description: This room is full of cool secret codes on the wall.

Treasure Room.name: Treasure Room
Treasure Room.failToEnter: The door is locked. You need a key to open it.
Treasure Room.entryMsg: Using your magic key, you open the door and find a room full of treasure and a shiny sword.
Treasure Room.description: There are lots of old chests and shiny things in this room.

Dragon Room.name: Dragon Room
Dragon Room.failToEnter: There's a big scary dragon in this room. You need to find a sword before you can fight it.
Dragon Room.description: You see the dragon and swords of fallen warriors on his feet
Dragon Room.emptyDescription: This room used to belong to a big scary dragon, but not anymore!

enemies.name: Big Scary Dragon
enemies.description: This dragon is big and loud, with fiery breath. But you're a brave adventurer!
enemies.youWin: Great job! With your awesome sword, you beat the dragon and saved the day!
